WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 30+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description:
Following error recieved when trying to run a build upgrade list after an optimize.
 
------------
 
Moved error log to attachment, please don't Wall of Text your submissions
WorkItem.Summary: Unhandled Exception during Build Upgrade List Execution

Comments.Message: Can you please post the character file that demonstrates this?

After recreating the crash several times this evening.  It appears to crash during the build upgrade list when it gets to the Seal of Valgarde every time I try to run it for this specific character.  Other characters appear to work fine.

It looks like in some cases with the genetic algorithm, the best candidate (bestIndividual) is not being located before a call is made to LookForDirectItemUpgrades, which makes an implicit assumption that bestIndividual != null. In particular this appears to happen when scores for certain candidates get evaluated as NaN (not sure why this happens).
moved error log to text file
